title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Jan 24th thru Jan
description:
I hope eight days was plenty of time for you all to get through the last eighteen broadcasts because you now have more to listen to! Anyway, Download, SEED, and definitely Enjoy! Thanks in advance to all the seeders and those that pass this on to other torrent sites. We are spreading the knowledge exponentially! Later All! Stokeman Out...


Thursday January 24th, 2008
The Doors & Jim Morrison
Starting in the first hour, author R. Gary Patterson was joined by guitarist Robby Krieger and keyboardist Ray Manzarek, both from the legendary Doors. The two musicians discussed being part of the group, working with Jim Morrison, and questions surrounding... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): R. Gary Patterson, Robby Krieger, Ray Manzarek

Friday January 25th, 2008
The Elite&#039;s Master Plan
Broadcasting live from the studios of KLBJ in Austin, Texas, George was joined by filmmaker and activist Alex Jones, who discussed his film Endgame and the Elite&#039;s master plan to dominate and oppress humanity. Jones warned listeners about a &#039;control-grid&#039;... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Alex Jones

Saturday January 26th, 2008
The Space Race
Historian Michael D&#039;Antonio discussed his new book A Ball, a Dog and a Monkey, which chronicles the rollicking start of the space race between the United States and Soviet Union. The first artificial satellite to be put into space was Sputnik 1... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Michael D&#039;Antonio, Catherine Austin Fitts

Sunday January 27th, 2008
ET & UFO Secrets
Retired Air Force Capt. Robert Collins spoke with George Knapp (email) about his investigations into UFOs, ETs, MJ-12 and government knowledge. Collins detailed his involvement with a secretive group with ties to intelligence and the military, known...
Host: George Knapp
Guest(s): Robert Collins, Alejandro Rojas, Ken Cherry, Dick Criswell

Monday January 28th, 2008
Prophecy, 2008 & Beyond
Prophecy scholar John Hogue discussed what the future has in store, including the economy, elections, climate change and terrorism. We&#039;re entering the first half of a 36 year cycle-- a chaotic, revolutionary period, he stated. Right now, we&#039;re heading... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): John Hogue, Raymond Moody

Tuesday January 29th, 2008
EMF Dangers
Appearing during the middle two hours, environmental consultant Cindy Sage discussed the dangerous health effects of electro-magnetic fields (EMF) radiating from a variety of sources. Of particular concern are the exponentially popular cell phones... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Cindy Sage, David B. Sereda

Wednesday January 30th, 2008
Bermuda Triangle Incident/Skinwalker Ranch Replay
George was live in the first hour with Dr. Roger Leir, and David Anderson, a former Navy pilot who spoke about his anomalous experiences in the Bermuda Triangle some 50 years ago. While flying a military plane from Puerto Rico to Florida, he found himself... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): David Anderson, Dr. Roger Leir, Colm A. Kelleher, George Knapp

Thursday January 31st, 2008
Forecast for 2008
Intuitive Sean David Morton shared his forecast for 2008 and beyond. We have entered the astrological period of Pluto in Capricorn and in relation to this, we could see a "huge revolution" against the Federal Reserve and U.S. tax system, a breakdown... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Sean David Morton, Jerome Corsi
